column5: Our group of 4 is heading to Lady Evelyn Lake for a week of fishing. We are traveling from Sault Ste. Marie to North Bay on 17, then north on 11 to Haileybury. We are looking to purchase 5 or 6 pounds of leeches at someplace in Canada along the way. Does anyone have any suggestions/names as to where we might be able to find leeches along that route? Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance.
